## Load Data

```{r cars}
dat <- read.csv("data/framingham2.csv")[,-1]

```

## Step

```{r}
str(dat)

lm_1 <- lm(TenYearCHD~. ,dat)

both_model <- step(lm_1,direction = "both")
summary(both_model)

forward_model <- step(lm_1, direction = "forward")
summary(forward_model)

backward_model <- step(lm_1, direction = "backward")
summary(backward_model)

```

## 다중공선성 확인

```{r }

car::vif(lm_1)

vif1 <- summary(both_model)
vif1$r.squared <- 1/(1-vif1$r.squared^2)  

vif1


```
